document.full_text: actress lindsay lohan began a sentence for jewelry theft under house arrest on thursday, but is likely to serve only about 35 days of her four month term, officials said.
document.title: lindsay lohan starts house arrest for jewelry theft
lines_and_colors: actress lindsay lohan began a sentence for jewelry theft under house arrest on thursday, but is likely to serve only about 35 days of her four month term, officials said.
